thread.title: realme 15T launched at Rs 19K

author: Admin 5
title: realme 15T launched at Rs 19K
text:
realme 15T launched at Rs 19K
realme 15T launched at Rs 19K
Hyderabad: realme, a popular smartphone brand has launched its latest model realme 15T. Designed as the segmentâ€™s only smartphone with a 50MP front and 50MP rear AI camera setup, it also features a massive 7000mAh Titan battery packed in a sleek 7.79mm body, while delivering flagship-grade Amoled clarity and advanced durability.
With breakthroughs like the 4000nit 4R Comfort+ Amoled, MediaTek Dimensity 6400 Max 5G processor, industry-leading IP66/68/69 water resistance, and pro-grade dual AI cameras, the new model sets new standard in its segment. The model features a textured matte 4R design with nano-scale microcrystalline finish for a premium feel and fingerprint resistance. At just 7.79mm thin and 181g light, it stands out as one of the slimmer and lighter large-battery smartphones. The blade-shaped stereo center frame enhances its sleek silhouette, while the Flowing Silver variant introduces the lowest camera bump in the segment at just 1.44mm.
